V.i.1.C.3.a
.
Referring to the Authorization Activity Claims That Are Unsupported by Law
Refer a claim to the authorization activity for an administrative denial of benefits when the claimed entitlement is unsupported by law.
Example
:  Such claims include pension claims from Veterans with only peacetime service.
Reference
:  For more information on conditions under which the authorization activity may deny a claim, see
M21-1, Part VI, Subpart i, 1.A.3.b and c
.
